recipesJson.name: Rin's Banana Pudding Cake
recipesJson.author: mixinvixens
recipesJson.description: I used part of my banana pudding (put in) recipe as a base for this cake. (Banana Nut Bread, Inw Biscuit) For the cake portion I wanted a frosting heavy cake as a component so I used fluffy white cake. I added the Philadelphia buttercake to add to the richness and add a buttercake note. Lastly I added the butterscotch cream pie for a light butterscotch note and to add creaminess.
